body.name: Aigybobo Montessori Toys for 1,2,3 Years Old, Toddlers Wooden Sorting and Stacking Toys, Preschool Fine Motor Skill Toy, Ideal Gift for Baby Boys Girls

features: Safe for Babies: Unlike other Montessori toys on the market, we understand that toddlers like to explore the world with their mouths, so each wooden block is made large enough, perfect size both to prevent young kids from swallowing and suitable for small hands to grasp. The pegs on the board are reinforced,they will not fall off and cause infants to accidentally eat them. We eliminate all safety hazards to let kids have fun without parents' worry.

Montessori Preschool Learning Toys: Our wooden shape sorter toy includes 20 blocks of 5 bright colors and 5 different geometric shape, stacked on 1 sorter board. These wooden blocks are so appealing to kids that they will love to play, both satisfy their curiosity and learn by play, building an early awareness of different shapes, colors and numbers.

Color Shape and Number Learning: This is a multi sensory developmental toy, toddlers can sort the different blocks by shape, color or the number of holes for pegs, exercise their color recognition, shape distinction and counting ability.When babies try to match the blocks to the target or make various combinations, it helps to develop fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination.Your babies will benefit a lot from this wooden educational toy!

Designed for Infants: About the material, we choose light and natural wood, which is durable and will not hurt the child.About the colors, we use safe water paint, which will not fade. The size is perfectly measured for small hands to grip. We carefully make each product, reducing the possibility of wood chips and smell, smooth surface, rounded edges, provide maximum safety guarantee for parents and toddlers!

Best Toddler Boys & Girls Gifts: If you're looking for a great gift for a toddler, then you'll love our montessori early learning sorting stacking toys. It's perfect as a Children's Day gift, birthday gift, Christmas gift, sock filler, easter basket filler, newborn gift and more, helping you discover new learning fun every time you give a gift ! Ideal baby gift for boy girl 1 2 3.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perfect Size Our each wooden block is made large enough, perfect size both to prevent young kids from swallowing and suitable for small hands to grasp. Sturdy Enough We understand kids like to explore the world with their mouths, so the pegs are reinforced, won't fall off and cause infants to accidentally swallow. Safe Material We use safe water paint, bright and not easy to fade. Each wooden block is carefully treated, smooth surface and rounded edges will not hurt kids. Smooth Edges Each block has been finely processed, the edges are smooth and burr-free, no sharp edges will cause harm to children. Kids can play without worry.

Wooden Shape Sorting & Stacking Toys Montessori Learning Toys for Toddlers Our range of Montessori wooden toys are specially designed for toddlers, with smooth edges, perfect size and absolutely safe for kids. Wooden shape sorting and stacking toys can help babies learn shapes, colors, numbers, improve their sorting, matching, stacking, counting skills, exercise hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Will give to my 19 month old grandson, he is gonna Love them!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This toy is rated for 1-3 y/o and my nephew is only 8 months old, but it is his new favorite. Right now it's more about the teething but he's already working out shapes and colors, numbers can come later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but small
reviews.reviewText: This was smaller than I thought it would be, even after thoroughly examining the pictures available to try to get a sense of the size. It’s still a good product and I’m going to give it to my niece - but just thought it would be a bit larger in total size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exelente. Mi niño es loco con el juguete. Y aprende a la ves

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a toy I really like.
reviews.reviewText: I gifted this toy to one of my little great grandchildren. It went over well with him. It’s a fun type of toy that even some adults tinkered with that day. He plays with it or does his work as he calls it fairly often. That pleases me when I choose successfully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Worth the money , keeps my daughter busy ! The material is durable & easy to clean ! Love this toy , helping my daughter learning her colors, shapes & motor skills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fine motor skills
reviews.reviewText: What a great toy for working on fine motor skills . The bright colors are wonderful and this has been a great toy so far .
well made , colourful and my 20 yr old grandson loves it. Plays it over and over. He is learning colours and numbers so a great educational wooden toy

My little man has loved this toy for a few months. He can’t thread them on yet but loves to pull them off and knock over a stack of them. They swell when wet though, so just be careful to quickly dry them if you rinse them.
